name: Zombies Racing Shooting Free Game
description:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=adJqBaOKGyQ&feature=youtu.be
One day all zombies return from darkness, zombiess are over all the world, zombies damage everything around, and zombies eat all people brain, is apocalypse day?? NOPE!!! You, only you can save the world by shooting to kill zombies all, clear them all from my world.
You hate zombies, you want shooting to kill zombies all and save the world for turning back to piece. Racing your car and shooting down kill zombies all the best guns equipped now, shooting zombies all kill them to die and bring piece for the world. Save the world is your mission, only you can save the world from death by shooting to kill zombies all.
This free game is good car racing shooting to kill zombies style game ever. You like action games, you like racing car and shooting zombies. You like drive racing car and shooting to kill zombies all. You like action racing shooting game. Download and play this racing shooting to kill zombies free game now.
Racing your car through zombies city road shooting down the zombies using machine guns and RPGs equipped on the car. Racing your car avoiding all obstacles on zombies racing city road and shooting zombies all, kill zombies as much as you can to save our world.

How to play Zombies Racing Shooting Free Game
- Control your car on racing zombies city road by acceleration
- tilt mobile control or left right buttons control avoiding all obstacles on racing road
- Tap the screen on zombies jumping on your racing cars shooting zombies die or control your car crashes and kill zombies on racing road

Zombies Racing Shooting Free Game feature
- Dark ruined city caused of zombies damaged
- Intense zombies-blasting action and racing gameplay!
- 5 exciting weapons and 5 cars at your disposal
- Story mode and endless mode with relentless zombies types
- Stunning 3D graphics and inspiring soundtracks
